verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:1
verses.text: Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:2
verses.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:3
verses.text: And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:4
verses.text: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:5
verses.text: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:6
verses.text: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:7
verses.text: And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:8
verses.text: And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:9
verses.text: And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:10
verses.text: And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:11
verses.text: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:12
verses.text: The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:13
verses.text: Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:14
verses.text: And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:15
verses.text: And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:16
verses.text: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:17
verses.text: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:18
verses.text: Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:19
verses.text: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:20
verses.text: And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:21
verses.text: And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:22
verses.text: And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:23
verses.text: And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:24
verses.text: And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:25
verses.text: And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:26
verses.text: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:27
verses.text: And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:28
verses.text: These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:29
verses.text: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife’s name was Maachah:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:30
verses.text: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:31
verses.text: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:32
verses.text: And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:33
verses.text: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi–shua, and Abinadab, and Esh–baal.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:34
verses.text: And the son of Jonathan was Merib–baal; and Merib–baal begat Micah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:35
verses.text: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:36
verses.text: And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:37
verses.text: And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:38
verses.text: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:39
verses.text: And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 8:40
verses.text: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons’ sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
